'''"...Shew the Kingdoms Thy Shame."''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. This achievement is earned during ''[[The Temple Where Sand Flows Like Tears]]''.
<!--
==Gameplay Notes==
-->
==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement refers to the Bible verse {{w|Nahum 3|Nahum 3:5}}.
** "Shew" is an archaic spelling of "show" that was used in the {{w|King James Version}}.
